resources.string: Please enter a valid identity number

As we checked your credit score, you are allowed to request this loan. Rather than that, the maximum amount of loan that you are able to request is:\n %d EUR \n Do you want to update your request or submit the current request?
As we checked your credit score, you are allowed to request this loan
The credit scoring system shows that you have debt in banking system. While you have debt in other banks, you are not allowed to request a new loan in the banking system.

As we checked your credit score, you are NOT allowed for this request. By considering your credit score in the banking system, the maximum amount for you to have a loan is:\n %d EUR \n You can update or cancel your request.
As we checked your credit score, you are allowed for this request, but by considering your credit score you should choose %d months for the loan period
